style: minimalist graphic illustration, high contrast, linocut-inspired, storybook art
use_case: Children's book illustrations, striking editorial art, unique brand mascots, digital wall art, storytelling visuals.
template: Minimalist graphic illustration, high contrast, bold black shapes, rough linocut texture, flat colors. A large stylized [SUBJECT] head dominates the upper frame, its features outlined in an accent color, with a tiny secondary figure interacting with its body or surroundings below. Ample negative space provides a stark, striking composition. Flat, even lighting, no discernible shadows, creating a graphic, clean look. [MOOD] atmosphere, with a [COLOR_SCHEME] palette featuring a single vibrant accent. In a [SETTING]. --ar 9:16

variable_explanations.[SUBJECT]: The main large character or object that will dominate the top of the frame (e.g., 'owl', 'dragon', 'ancient tree').
variable_explanations.[MOOD]: The overall emotional tone or atmosphere of the scene (e.g., 'eerie', 'peaceful', 'mysterious', 'playful').
variable_explanations.[COLOR_SCHEME]: Describes the primary background and accent color palette, always retaining the high-contrast black/white base (e.g., 'cool blues', 'warm earth tones', 'vibrant neons', 'muted greens').
variable_explanations.[SETTING]: The subtle environment or context where the scene takes place, often implied rather than explicit (e.g., 'forest clearing', 'mountain path', 'cosmic void', 'urban alleyway').

examples: Minimalist graphic illustration, high contrast, bold black shapes, rough linocut texture, flat colors. A large stylized owl head dominates the upper frame, its features outlined in an accent color, with a tiny secondary figure interacting with its body or surroundings below. Ample negative space provides a stark, striking composition. Flat, even lighting, no discernible shadows, creating a graphic, clean look. Wise atmosphere, with a cool blues palette featuring a single vibrant accent. In an ancient tree hollow. --ar 9:16

tips: Experiment with the [COLOR_SCHEME] to introduce various accent colors (e.g., 'single deep red accent', 'bright yellow accent', 'subtle teal accent').
For the [SUBJECT], consider creatures or objects with strong, recognizable silhouettes to maximize the impact of the high-contrast style.
The 'tiny secondary figure' is a hardcoded compositional element; ensure your [SUBJECT] choice naturally allows for this interaction without becoming too busy.
description: Unlock a world of impactful visual storytelling with this template. Designed for striking simplicity, it captures a unique high-contrast, linocut-inspired style perfect for dramatic and memorable illustrations. Focus on your subject, set the mood, and let the minimalist aesthetics convey powerful narratives.
instructions: Use this template to generate similar images.

promptbase_ready.title: Stark Silhouette Narratives
